elements phone phone Element
phone &phone.purpose;
&phone.synopsis.gen; Description
Phone identifies a telephone number in an Address.
Processing expectations
&format.inline; &format.csuppress; In an Address, this element may inherit the verbatim qualities of an address.
&phone.parents.gen; &phone.children.gen;

Examples
For examples, see &phone.example.seealso.gen;.
